description: The test specification details the test specification criteria and the tested evaluated property(s) required for a testable object to match the quality or performance requirements of the business or particular customers
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The child test specifications of this test specification

contents.name: specifiesTestForOperations
contents.description: The operations test requirement ID(s) evaluated by this test specification

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The test specification property values of this test specification

contents.name: isMadeUpOfCriteria
contents.description: The test specification criteria which is to be applied to determine the test outcome upon evaluation of the test specification

contents.name: evaluates
contents.description: The evaluated property(s) measured and evaluated by this test specification

contents.name: specifiesTestForObject
contents.description: The ID of the testable object tested by this test specification

contents.name: description
contents.description: A description of the test specification

contents.name: version
contents.description: An identification of the version of the test specification

contents.name: effectiveStartDate
contents.description: The effective start date and time for use of the test specification or set of test specifications

contents.name: effectiveEndDate
contents.description: The effective end date and time for use of the test specification or set of test specifications

contents.name: publishedDate
contents.description: The date and time on which the test specification was published or generated

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: testSampleSize
contents.description: Sample size required to perform the test

contents.name: physicalSample
contents.description: Defines whether physical sampling is required to perform the test

contents.name: recurrenceQuantity
contents.description: The amount of operations activity required between samples

contents.name: recurrenceTimeInterval
contents.description: The duration of operational activity required between samples
